statements: DELETE FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1 AND username = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM user_accounts WHERE permission_level > 2 AND email = 'admin@example.com';
DELETE FROM permissions WHERE permission_level > 5 AND user_id = 123;
DELETE FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'admin' OR password = 'supersecret';
DELETE FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = '83b5ec77-87fa-4c2d-a1c7-ff4f95a8e4dc' AND permission_id = '5d94cfdd-18ff-4a3a-9e81-871ad9a4293e';
DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1 AND role_id = 2;
